name: New Year, New You Weight Loss Challenge
description:
Are you ready for a change?

Enroll today in the New Year, New You Weight Loss Challenge!

$15 Enrollment Fee will go towards prizes. 

First Place: $150 Visa Gift Card, Second $100 Visa Gift Card, Third: $50 Visa Gift Card

1. Send your beginning photo to my email (misscurvyandfit@gmail.com) by 11:59 EST on January 1st. It MUST include your name and you holding a sign with the date. I suggest that you wear something tight or revealing so that your transformation is evident.

2. Keep us updated on your progress, workouts, meals. I'll be sending a welcome letter with the Facebook Group Link. Or you may use the tag #misscurvyandfit on Instagram.

3. Participate in the mini-challenges each week. We will have a water challenge, fruits and vegetable challenge, cardio challenge, etc. Newsletters will be sent out weekly with this information.

4. Send your final photograph to be judged by 11:59pm on February 28th. It MUST include the date and you MUST wear the same outfit.

name: Real Women Tee
description:
Real women are two things..... Curvy & Fit!

Preshrunk 
100% Cotton (Port & Company)

Shipping: Please allow two business days for your order to be processed. Items are shipped via USPS first class (3-5 business days). 

Return Policy: Exchange only.

name: Clean Eating: Meal Plan Edition One
description:
With clean eating, exercise, and positive thinking, you will soon discover the new and improved YOU.

This meal plan has been carefully designed to help you lose weight. By creating a calorie deficit (burning more than you eat), you are forcing your body to use fat stores for energy thus promoting weight loss.

• 31 Days
• 5 Meals a Day
• Designed to support weight loss (1200-1500 calories a day)
• Easy preparation
• Delicious and smart choices

I provide alternatives for variety, allergies, or preference. If there is something that you do not like after ordering, I will help customize your plan.

Please allow 48 hours to receive The Clean Eating: Meal Plan (PDF) via e-mail. Double check your e-mail for accuracy when ordering.

name: Miss Curvy & Fit Tee
description:
